summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2553, for the improvement of 15th Avenue Northeast from the alley north of Ravenna Boulevard to the Seattle Electric Company right of way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 29616 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
